Categories

Stores the thread ratings.

Field Type Null Key Default Description
rid int(10) No Primary Rating ID
tid int(10) No Multiple 0 Thread ID
uid int(10) No 0 Rater user ID
rating smallint(5) No 0 The rating value
ipaddress varchar(30) No IP address of the rater

Indexes:

Keyname Type Cardinality Field
PRIMARY PRIMARY 0 rid
tid INDEX None tid, uid
